size.description: size of the person. In format 1.80m

birth_date.description: Date of birth of the person. In the format YYYY-MM-DD

issuing_country.description: country issuing the identity document. ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 code

issuing_date.description: Date of issue of the identity document. In the format YYYY-MM-DD

validity.description: validity date of the document. In the format YYYY-MM-DD
